articles.title: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of NDFSK interviewed by reporters
articles.content:
Korean books donated to Syria 
    Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of donating Korean books was held at the head office of the Syrian Arab Socialist Union Party on June 5.
 At the ceremony leader Kim Jong Il's works and other Korean books including "Kim Jong Il-Glory of Korea" and "Army of Korea" were conveyed to the General Secretary of the party.
 The General Secretary said that Kim Jong Il has performed immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and wise leadership. The party is greatly honored and proud to receive his famous works, he noted, adding that the party would use his works as must books for members of its political bureau and leadership and all its members.
